The phase 1 trial design follow Initial Accelerated Titration design follow traditional `` 3+3 '' cohort design establish maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) recommend phase 2 dose ( RPTD ) phase 2 portion study . It anticipate patient receive 6 treatment cycle . In absence unacceptable toxicity disease progression , patient option continue treatment beyond 6 cycle , investigator determines patient may benefit .
